rules_text:
Flying
When Beauracratic Deva enters, roll a D20.
[b]1-9[/b]| Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature.
[b]10-19[/b]|Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
[b]20[/b]|Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
